畍字的基本解释

畍
jiè
古同“界”。

畍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiè］
［《廣韻》古拜切，去怪，見。］
亦作“堺1”。亦作“畍1”。
(1)地界；边界。
(2)界限；范围。
(3)边沿。
(4)接界；接连。
(5)分划。
(6)隔开。
(7)离间。
(8)犹临。靠近；对着。
(9)称某一特殊的境域。
(10)指社会上按职业、工作、地位或性别等的不同而划分的人群。
(11)指大自然中动物、植物、矿物等的最大类别。
(12)书纸上的行格，上下框为栏，直行为界。参见“界行”。
(13)指宋代发行纸币“交子”三年一换的期限。每次发行交子有一定限额，以铁钱为现金准备，三年兑现一次，换发新交子，称为一界。
(14)佛教语。犹范畴。特指空间，与“世”相对。
(15)地质学名词。指在整个地质年代某个“代”时期内形成的地层。
(16)通“介”。披甲。参见“界乘”。
(17)通“介”。倚仗。
(18)通“介”。居，处于。指处于二者之间。
(19)通“介”。量词。相当于“个”。
(20)通“届”。至，到。参见“界滿”。

畍字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　畍； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页760第19
【玉篇】同界。

畍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
畍字的起名意思

暂无。

畍
Basic explanation of words
畍
jiè
The ancient same "boundary".
畍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiè］
["Guangyun" Gubai cut, go to blame, see. ]
Also known as "Sakai 1". Also known as "畍1".
(1) Land boundary; boundary.
(2) Limit; scope.
(3) Edge.
(4) Boundary; successive.
(5) Division.
(6) Separate.
(7) Separation.
(8) Yulin. Close to;
(9) It is called a special realm.
(10) Refers to groups of people in the society divided according to different occupations, jobs, status or gender.
(11) Refers to the largest category of animals, plants, minerals, etc. in nature.
(12) The lines on the book paper, the upper and lower boxes are columns, and the straight lines are the boundaries. See "jiexing".
(13) Refers to the three-year time limit for the issue of "Jiaozi" banknotes issued in the Song Dynasty. Each time there is a certain limit for the issuance of handovers, iron money is used as cash reserve, and it is redeemed once every three years, and new handovers are exchanged, which is called Yijie.
(14) Buddhist language. Judgment category. Specifically refers to space, as opposed to "world".
(15) Geological terms. Refers to the strata formed in a certain "generation" period of the entire geological age.
(16) Through "introduction". Armored. See "boundary multiplication".
(17) Through "introduction". rely.
(18) Through "introduction". Home, be in. Refers to being in between.
(19) Through "introduction". quantifier. Equivalent to "a".
(20) Through "session". To, to. See "boundary full".
畍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Wu Ji 1】【Tian Zi Department】　畍; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: Page 760 Page 19
【Jade articles】The same world.
